name: Gary Proxima
description:
Gary Proxima: Alien Hunter

You are Gary Proxima and you are the earths last hope after an Alien Invasion.
The military didn't stand a chance so they sent you in with an arsenal of your favorite weapon... Proximity Mines!

Hunt down all the Aliens and save Humanity!

This Game was Created for Game Jam Aotearoa: 2020

Assets Used:

  • Yughes Free Bombs
  • Adventurer Blake
  • Biomechanical Mutant
  • POLYGON - City Pack (Provided By Synty Studios)
  • POLYGON - Prototype Pack (Provided by Synty Studios)

Animations Sourced From Mixamo   

News Paper Clippings Generated from: Fodeys.com
